transaction_count.column_description: Number of transactions included in this block

nonce.column_description: Difficulty solution specified in block header

timestamp.column_description: Block creation timestamp specified in block header

size.column_description: The size of block data in bytes

status.column_description: Either 1 (success) or 0 (failure, due to any operation that can cause the call itself or any top-level call to revert)

transaction_index.column_description: Integer of the transactions index position in the block

call_type.column_description: One of call, callcode, delegatecall, staticcall

block_hash.column_description: Hash of the block where this trace was in

gas.column_description: Gas provided with the message call

gas_used.column_description: Gas used by the message call

block_timestamp.column_description: Timestamp of the block where this trace was in

output.column_description: The output of the message call, bytecode of contract when trace_type is create

transaction_hash.column_description: Transaction hash where this trace was in

trace_address.column_description: Comma separated list of trace address in call tree

block_number.column_description: Block number where this trace was in

from_address.column_description: Address of the sender, null when trace_type is genesis or reward

error.column_description: Error if message call failed. This field doesn't contain top-level trace errors.

input.column_description: The data sent along with the message call

to_address.column_description: Address of the receiver if trace_type is call, address of new contract or null if trace_type is create, beneficiary address if trace_type is suicide, miner address if trace_type is reward, shareholder address if trace_type is genesis, WithdrawDAO address if trace_type is daofork

trace_type.column_description: One of call, create, suicide, reward, genesis, daofork

block_number.column_description: Number of the block which contains this transaction

block_hash.column_description: Hash of the block which contains this transaction

block_timestamp.column_description: Timestamp of the block which contains this transaction
